_xResult.title: Stunner in the Room Maxi
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made party dress with off-shoulder cut
_xResult.longdesc:
Wow—this custom made dress is a vision on a computer screen, so we can't imagine what it might look like on you in real life. Everything about it, from the off-the-shoulder cut, three-quarter length sleeves and hemline just above the ankle screams s-e-x-y modesty. This made to measure dress demands to be seen, crafted in a unique knit fabric that shimmers in a glorious purple. 

Hate three-quarter sleeves? Sometimes they just aren't right—but lucky you, they can be customized to full-length sleeves as well.

 

You need a dress made custom to your measurements. You'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly!
